name: afni
author: AFNI Developers
description: Tool for reading in sessions of 3D datasets and visualizing them

inputs.description: Input session directories containing the datasets
inputs.name: Session Directories

inputs.description: Gather all datasets corresponding to a single subject identifier
inputs.name: By Subject

inputs.description: Read in all datasets from all listed folders together
inputs.name: All datasets

inputs.description: Conserve memory by purging unused datasets
inputs.name: Purge Unused Datasets

inputs.description: Start up the color 'pbar' to use only positive function values
inputs.name: Positive Function Values

inputs.description: Recursively search each session_directory for more session subdirectories
inputs.name: Recursive Search

inputs.description: Tells AFNI not to read *.1D timeseries files
inputs.name: No 1D timeseries

inputs.description: Tells AFNI not to read *.csv files
inputs.name: No CSV files

inputs.description: Tells AFNI not to read *.tsv files
inputs.name: No TSV files

inputs.description: Create a unique set of colors for each AFNI controller window
inputs.name: Unique Colors

inputs.description: Orientation code for displaying x-y-z coordinates
inputs.name: Orientation Code

inputs.description: Do not load plugins
inputs.name: No Plugins

inputs.description: Show hidden plugins
inputs.name: Show Hidden Plugins

inputs.description: Do not hide plugins
inputs.name: Allow All Plugins

inputs.description: Listen for plugouts
inputs.name: Enable Plugouts

inputs.description: Plugout code prints lots of messages (for debugging)
inputs.name: Debug Plugouts

inputs.description: Do not listen for plugouts
inputs.name: Disable Plugouts

inputs.description: Do not read .afnirc file
inputs.name: Skip .afnirc

inputs.description: Read initial windows layout from a file
inputs.name: Layout file

inputs.description: Turn on listening for NIML-formatted data from SUMA
inputs.name: NIML Data

inputs.description: Provide a port offset for multiple instances
inputs.name: Port Offset

inputs.description: Like -np but quieter in case of errors
inputs.name: Port Offset Quiet

inputs.description: Provide a block of port numbers
inputs.name: Port Offset Block

inputs.description: Specify command strings to drive AFNI on startup
inputs.name: Command String

inputs.description: Character to use as a separator for commands
inputs.name: Command Separator

output-files.description: Output file for the session data
output-files.name: Session Output File
